findings.rationale: The absence of indemnification obligations may expose parties to unforeseen liabilities without recourse.
findings.evidence_quote: No indemnification obligations apply under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: Limiting liability to fees paid may not adequately protect against significant damages.
findings.evidence_quote: Each party's liability under this Agreement is limited to the total fees paid hereunder.

findings.rationale: Lack of audit rights limits oversight and may lead to misuse of confidential information.
findings.evidence_quote: No audit rights are granted under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: The definition of confidential information may be too broad or vague, risking unintentional disclosures.
findings.evidence_quote: Confidential Information means all non-public information disclosed by one party to the other.
